sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
McHenry County Dam Act.

sections.heading: For and on behalf of the State of Illinois, the Department of Public
sections.text:
Works and Buildings shall have the power to
acquire by donation, the title to the following land:

sections.heading: After the acquisition of the land and property aforesaid, it
sections.text:
shall be the duty of the Department of Natural Resources, as successor to the
Department of Transportation and the Department of Public Works:

sections.heading: There is appropriated to the Department of Public Works and
sections.text:
Buildings for carrying out the provisions of this Act the sum of seven thousand
five hundred dollars ($7,500).

sections.heading: The Department of Natural Resources shall have authority:
sections.text: The Department of Natural Resources shall have authority:
